#summary Short summary of changes for the current build of Fragmentation Analyzer. (Note that this may not be the same as the released version.)

----

 * NEW FEATURE: The fragment ion scoring type selection is now stored in the user properties file and saved between each run of the tool. 
 * FEATURE IMPROVEMENT: The import/load process has been simplified and improved.
 * BUG FIX: The analysis buttons did not get disabled when doing a new search.
